loginType.fieldDescription: If the page to login is specified, you can choose between open it in the same page or another one.
loginType.name: ./loginType

loginTarget.fieldDescription: If the page to login is specified, you can choose between open it in the same page or another one.
loginTarget.name: ./loginTarget

close.title: Close Button (Used to close mega menu and login overlays)

custom-form.fieldDescription: Active this option to change the Contact Form on the side bar specified below
custom-form.name: ./customForm

custom-sitelink.fieldDescription: Active this option to change the default Sitelink Searchbox configuration
custom-sitelink.name: ./customSitelinkSearchbox

custom-sitelink-url.fieldDescription: Canonical URL of the WebSite homepage. E.g. https://www.metlife.com
custom-sitelink-url.name: ./sitelinkSearchboxURL

custom-sitelink-target.fieldDescription:
A URL that points to an address on the same domain as the WebSite URL..
E.g. https://www.metlife.com/search?query=
custom-sitelink-target.name: ./sitelinkSearchboxTarget

cookieBannerExpiryPeriod.fieldDescription: Please enter a number greater than 364 (Days).
cookieBannerExpiryPeriod.name: ./cookieBannerExpiryPeriod

famrs.fieldDescription: Click the '+' to add a new section
famrs.name: ./farmLinkSecction

links.fieldDescription: Click the '+' to add a new link
links.name: ./farmLinks

countries.fieldDescription: Click the '+' to add a new country
countries.name: ./americasCountries

countries.name: ./asiaCountries

countries.name: ./middleEastAndAfricaCountries

defaultCountryFlag.name: ./defaultFlagCountry

links.fieldDescription: Click the '+' to add a new link
links.name: ./languageSelector

medialinks.fieldDescription: Click the '+' to add a new social media platforms
medialinks.name: ./footersociallinks

bullets.fieldDescription: Click the '+' to add a new bullet
bullets.name: ./footerbulletlinks
